headline: PTC Therapeutics to Host R&D Day
summary: PTC Therapeutics, Inc. (NASDAQ: PTCT) today announced that it will host an R&D Day to discuss its pipeline on Dec. 2, 2025, at 9:30 a.m. EST in New York City. The event will also be webcast.
